forum.content:
花枝招展
一切沒有想像中的黑暗，只要願意就會耀眼光芒。
愛自己，為自己閃耀～

Squid - Be your own gorgeously
Everything is not as dark as you imagine.
Just be willing to bright up ur life, and shine for it.
Love yourself, be your own gorgeously.

🚩The first word of squid In Chinese = flower
Squid = 花枝 = Flower branches
花枝招展 = flower branches blooming = dress up gorgeously
水彩紙 X 24色水彩

https://m.facebook.com/peidos/
forum.title: 沛室空間 - 花枝招展
